snippet: The West Indies star Chris Gayle accused his nation’s cricket board of victimization after the all-rounders Dwayne Bravo and Kieron Pollard were left out of the country’s World Cup squad.
abstract: Cricket star Chris Gayle of West Indies criticizes nation’s cricket board for leaving all-rounders Dwayne Bravo and Kieron Pollard off World Cup team.
lead_paragraph: The West Indies star Chris Gayle accused his nation’s cricket board of victimization after the all-rounders Dwayne Bravo and Kieron Pollard were left out of the country’s World Cup squad.

headline.main: Criticism After Cricket World Cup Omissions
